Package jaengine.modules.physics

Class RigidBody

  • java.lang.Object
    • jaengine.modules.physics.GameAttribute
      • jaengine.modules.physics.RigidBody
  • public class RigidBody
extends GameAttribute
    The RigidBody class outlines how a physics-applicable object is to move. It contains all physics and keeps track of velocity, forces, and torques

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class jaengine.modules.physics.GameAttribute
